briefTitle: Mindfulness-based Stress Reduction (MBSR) Program Combined With Endurance Exercise Training: a Help in Treatment for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effect of a Mindfulness-based Stress Reduction (MBSR) Program Combined With Endurance Exercise Training: a Help to Improve Exercise Capacity and Quality of Life in Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Evolution of V02 max between inclusion and 8 weeks
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer
* Having completed the chemotherapy period
* Undergoing radiotherapy and/or hormono therapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Regular physical activity higher than 4 hours per week.
* Any disease cardiac, respiratory, neurological or articular disease, which counteract the muscular training )
